ABOUT ME

Welcome to my portfolio.My name is Kate Smerdon, i'm 21 years old, born and raised in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada; currently studying at Algonquin College for Graphic Design. I have a strong passion for design,fashion, and photography. For business inquiries or questions feel free to contact me using the links below.
